title: Maruti Suzuki to pump in Rs 38,200 crore in Gujarat
description: Maruti Suzuki India plans to invest Rs 38,200 crore in Gujarat to double its production capacity to 4 million units by FY31. The company, which is the third-largest automobile market globally, has scaled up production capacity significantly. The local arm of Suzuki will set up a million unit per annum capacity plant in Gujarat, with production expected to start in FY29.
